title: Introducing: Sombear
body:
This debut track from Minneapolis’s [**Sombear**](http://www.facebook.com/Sombear?sk=info) is pretty special. The side-project of **Bradley Hale** of **Now, Now**, **Sombear** finds him exploring his electronic and pop influences, and breathing a more expansive atmosphere into first track _Easy Thief_. Coming in somewhere between **Washed Out** and **Youth Lagoon**, there’s a real feel-good, youthful vibe emanated throughout _Easy Thief_, playing to the simplicity of the track. Whilst this is the only full cut available from **Sombear** so far, you can hear a snippet of the more upbeat _Incredibly Still_ via his [Soundcloud](http://soundcloud.com/sombear).

 [Easy Thief](http://soundcloud.com/sombear/easy-thief) by [SOMBEAR](http://soundcloud.com/sombear)
